thread.title: WHOAAAA! Bigg Boss 10 contestant Karan Mehra's wife Nisha Rawal is PREGNANT and it's CONFIRMED - ABP Live

title: WHOAAAA! Bigg Boss 10 contestant Karan Mehra's wife Nisha Rawal is PREGNANT and it's CONFIRMED - ABP Live
text:
> WHOAAAA! Bigg Boss 10 contestant Karan Mehra’s wife Nisha Rawal is PREGNANT and it’s CONFIRMED WHOAAAA! Bigg Boss 10 contestant Karan Mehra’s wife Nisha Rawal is PREGNANT and it’s CONFIRMED By: ABP News Web Desk | Last Updated: Monday, 9 January 2017 11:04 PM Image Courtesy - Instagram/Nisharawal 
New Delhi : On the one hand we all are just busy in knowing who will win the immunity task and get the ticket to finale and on the another side of the life outside Bigg Boss 10 house, Karan Mehra has got a good news for all of us. 
Few days ago there were speculations that Karan’s wife Nisha Rawal is pregnant but it was just a rumour as the couple was mum on the topic. Karan later on said that whenever this happens, he will share the good news with everyone. 
So finally that moment arrived and Karan’s wife Nisha Rawal announced about her pregnancy on Instagram in the most adorable way. 
Nisha uploaded a picture with a baby bump and wrote “Here’s putting all speculations about my weight gain to rest: 
Yes our 1st baby is on the way & we are 
on our way to bringing a new life on this planet, need all your good wishes ???? 
P.S.:I hope the privacy of my pregnancy journey will be respected and I won’t be asked over n over again to make posts on the same and shall be given space to post at will.” A photo posted by Nisha Rawal (@missnisharawal) on Jan 9, 2017 at 7:17am PST 
Karan Mehra got fame from Star Plus show Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai by playing the character of Naitik. 
He was also the part of Colors TV reality show Bigg Boss 10 but got evicted soon. 
Well, Congratulations to Karan Mehra and Nisha Rawal. First Published: Monday, 9 January 2017 11:04 PM 0
